  1. # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
  2. import os
  3. import json
  4. from ftplib import FTP
  5. import tempfile
  7. from django.views.generic.base import View
  8. from django.http import HttpResponse, Http404
  9. from django.utils.decorators import method_decorator
  10. from django.views.decorators.csrf import csrf_exempt
  12. from .models import Log, Service
  13. from .conf import *
  14. from .utils.core import absolute_url, LockError
  15. from .utils.ftp import ftp_connection
  16. from .utils.email import notification_success, notification_fail
  17. from .utils.curl import curl_connection
  20. class DeployView(View):
  22. """Main view receive POST Hook from repository"""
  24. @method_decorator(csrf_exempt)
  25. def dispatch(self, *args, **kwargs):
  26. try:
  27. self.service = Service.objects.get(secret_key=kwargs['secret_key'])
  28. except Exception, e:
  29. raise Http404
  31. self.status = 200
  33. self.bitbucket_username = BITBUCKET_SETTINGS['username']
  34. self.bitbucket_password = BITBUCKET_SETTINGS['password']
  35. self.bitbucket_branch = self.service.repo_branch
  37. self.ftp_host = self.service.ftp_host
  38. self.ftp_username = self.service.ftp_username
  39. self.ftp_password = self.service.ftp_password
  40. self.ftp_path = self.service.ftp_path
  42. return super(DeployView, self).dispatch(*args, **kwargs)
  44. def post(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
  46. self.json_string = request.POST['payload'].decode('string_escape').replace('\n', '')
  47. self.data = json.loads(self.json_string)
  48. last_commit = len(self.data['commits']) - 1
  51. if self.data['commits'][last_commit]['branch'] == self.bitbucket_branch:
  52. self.log = Log()
  53. self.log.payload = self.json_string
  54. self.log.service = self.service
  55. self.log.save()
  57. try:
  58. self.ftp = ftp_connection(self.ftp_host, self.ftp_username, self.ftp_password, self.ftp_path)
  60. if self.service.lock:
  61. raise LockError()
  63. self.service.lock = True
  64. self.service.save()
  66. self.ftp.connect()
  68. except LockError, e:
  69. self.set_fail(request, 'Service Locked', e)
  70. except Exception, e:
  71. self.set_fail(request, 'FTP Connection', e)
  72. else:
  73. try:
  74. curl = curl_connection(self.bitbucket_username, self.bitbucket_password)
  75. curl.authenticate()
  77. for i, commit in enumerate(self.data['commits']):
  79. for files in commit['files']:
  80. file_path = files['file']
  82. if files['type'] == 'removed':
  83. self.ftp.remove_file(file_path)
  84. else:
  85. url = 'https://api.bitbucket.org/1.0.0/repositories%sraw/%s/%s' % (self.data['repository']['absolute_url'], commit['node'], file_path)
  86. url = str(url.encode('utf-8'))
  88. value = curl.perform(url)
  90. temp_file = tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(delete=False)
  91. temp_file.write(value)
  92. temp_file.close()
  93. temp_file = open(temp_file.name, 'rb')
  95. self.ftp.make_dirs(file_path)
  96. self.ftp.create_file(file_path, temp_file)
  98. temp_file.close()
  99. os.unlink(temp_file.name)
  101. except Exception, e:
  102. self.set_fail(request, self.data['user'], e)
  103. else:
  104. self.log.user = self.data['user']
  105. self.log.status = True
  106. self.log.save()
  107. notification_success(absolute_url(request).build(), self.service, self.json_string)
  108. finally:
  109. curl.close()
  111. finally:
  112. self.ftp.quit()
  113. self.service.lock = False
  114. self.service.check()
  115. self.service.save()
  117. return HttpResponse(status=self.status)
  119. def set_fail(self, request, user, message):
  120. self.log.user = user
  121. self.log.status_message = message
  122. self.log.status = False
  123. self.log.save()
  124. self.status = 500
  125. notification_fail(absolute_url(request).build(), self.service, self.json_string, message)
